summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs will convene on March 7, 2024, at 11:00 AM at Dallas City Hall, 6ES, Council Briefing Room. The meeting aims to discuss key aspects of the City Manager recruitment process, including feedback mechanisms and timelines.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the February 26, 2024 meeting.
2. Discussion on City Council feedback regarding a survey related to the City Manager recruitment.
3. Review of a proposed template for an employee survey concerning the City Manager recruitment.
4. Outline of the timeline for the Request for Proposals (RFP) for a City Manager recruitment consultant.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a discussion led by Nina Arias from Human Resources regarding the feedback survey and the employee survey template. Additionally, the timeline for the recruitment consultant RFP will be presented by both Nina Arias and Danielle Thompson from the Office of Procurement Services.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will discuss and potentially approve the survey templates and timeline for the recruitment process. The meeting may also enter an executive session to address sensitive matters related to recruitment and employment evaluations. 

The public can attend the meeting in person or virtually, with live broadcasting available on Spectrum Cable Channel 16 and online.
